body:
This implementation is not what I was expecting from the function name (I was expecting the toDense version).

The reason being that "to" implies a map and there's a perfectly valid map for all non-undefined backends to device types.  I'd suggest either changing the implementation or renaming to something like "backendAsDeviceType", to emphasize this is the device type when the backend is used as a device type.

body_text:
This implementation is not what I was expecting from the function name (I was expecting the toDense version).
The reason being that "to" implies a map and there's a perfectly valid map for all non-undefined backends to device types.  I'd suggest either changing the implementation or renaming to something like "backendAsDeviceType", to emphasize this is the device type when the backend is used as a device type.
